com.entity.npc

Class EnemyProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.entity.npc.EnemyProfile

  • public class EnemyProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    A profile for a generated enemy, with statistics, an ability list etc. This is effectively just an intermediary to keep the Enemy class clean.
    Author:
    Christopher
